ygData.subject: Re: HALO and EYE are BOTH conjuation
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like a bug... Listed as Conjuration, but when you cast and hit the magic Learn point you actually gain in Divination.... any one want to slash bug that
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like a bug...

Listed as Conjuration, but when you cast and hit the magic Learn point you
actually gain in Divination....

any one want to slash bug that one?

Rutreeii

----- Original Message -----
From: Mata <mata_eq@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 9:28 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] HALO and EYE are BOTH conjuation


> From: "Mata" <mata_eq@...>
>
> OK HALO of LIGHT and EYE of ZOOM are both CONJURATION GAME OVER! I only
> fizzle on conjuation spells usually and I just looked BOTH are conjuration
.
> . .
>
> Dex helps your chance "to hit"...
>
>
> >
> > > Eye of Zoom is conjuration? I tought it was divination... I'm not
> > > aware of any conjuration spell for Wizards.
> >
> > Both Eye of Zomm and Halo of Light are Conjuration,although I have a
> > feeling the latter one also checks against Divination.
> >
> >
> > ANSWER
> > ---------------
> >
> > No, eye of zom is conjuration that s right but halo of light is
divination
> > (as sense magic). A question for all of you guys :
> >
> >
> > Do you know what s the purpose of the dexterity ?? I get a cape ac 8
plus
> 5
> > in dexterity.. And i don t see any change for ac or for sepl. Any idea ?
> > A second question : you just said eye of zom can open door cool : is it
> > working for door like in befallen ????
> >
> > thanks
> >
> >
> > yakos

> > level 18 wizzard opn karana
